lead_paragraph: The researcher, Matthew Trevithick, is decompressing in Massachusetts after being held for 40 days, his family said, and is not ready to speak publicly about his ordeal.

headline.main: Freed by Iran, Matthew Trevithick Quietly Readjusts Back Home

snippet: The researcher, Matthew Trevithick, is decompressing in Massachusetts after being held for 40 days, his family said, and is not ready to speak publicly about his ordeal.
